tutorial.speak:
To add a person to B1 Admin, start from the Search People page and click the "Add Person" button in the top right corner.
This opens the "Add a New Person" form with fields for First Name, Last Name, and Email.
Enter the person's first name, last name, and email address, then click the "Add" button.
The person is now added to your database and their profile page will open automatically.
